title: Reload my club please.
body:
Greetings **Riot!**
Can you reload my club please? It seems to be stuck!

**Club:** Hell Side
**Tag:** Hell
**Owner:** Evil Agramon
**Server:** EUNE

Thank you so much!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: I'm not sure what you mean by reload club.  Resetting or manually creating clubs are not something we're able to do, unfortunately.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help out individually, but be sure to be super specific so we're on the same page.  We're happy to help!
I'am owner of the club Hell Side but i cant see the club at all after you "updated" clubs. Thats the issue.
Thanks for the update!  We're looking into a few issues with clubs and would like to review your situation too.  Reach out to us in a ticket!
